Description: Fragment of painted stone tomb-wall; Inherkhau and son.
Curator's comments: xxiii Keller in Davies, Colour and Painting, London 2001, p. 86, col. pl. 28 [2].
From Chamber F, north wall. Published; J-P. Corteggiani and N. Cherpion, La tombe d'Inherkhaouy (TT 359) a Deir el-Medina (MIFAO128, 2010), 62-82, pl. 63.
Additional IDs: Other BM number: EA5613 (original Big Number)
